scripts.build:cloudflare: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y && . "$HOME/.cargo/env" && cargo install wasm-pack && env > apps/react-app/.env && yarn build
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf ./target & rm -rf ./test-ledger & yarn --cwd apps/react-app clean & yarn --cwd packages/margin clean & yarn --cwd packages/fixed_term clean & find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.clean:ts: yarn --cwd apps/react-app clean & yarn --cwd packages/margin clean & yarn --cwd packages/fixed_term clean & find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.docs:rust: cargo doc -p jet-margin -p jet-margin-pool -p jet-margin-swap -p jet-market --no-deps && cp -r ./target/doc/* ./docs/margin-rust
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint && git add .
